title: How to Make Linzer Torte

steps.headline: Mix the butter together with the sugar in a medium sized bowl.
Mix the baking powder with the flour.
steps.description: Check to see if they are well combined. If they are not, mix for longer to ensure that they are evenly distributed. Sift the baking powder and flour into the bowl with the butter.

steps.headline: Knead all of the ingredients to form a dough.
Add the nuts, egg, and spices to the dough.
Place the dough in the refrigerator.
steps.description: Let it sit for at least half an hour (three hours at the most). Then, remove from the refrigerator.

steps.headline: Separate the dough into four roughly even pieces.
Take 3/4 of the dough and roll it out.
steps.description: Watch how to roll pie dough here: how to roll and crimp pie dough. The dough should be about 2 centimeter (0.8 in) thick and should have a diameter of about 22 centimeters (8.7 in).

steps.headline: Spread the jam evenly onto the dough.
Form a roll using the other quarter of the dough.
Make a lattice crust for the top crust.
steps.description: Learn how: making a lattice top pie crust.

steps.headline: Brush the lattice crust with an egg wash.
steps.description: Learn to make an egg wash here.

steps.headline: Place the cake in the oven and bake it at 190 °C (374 °F) for about 45 Minutes
Cool the baked pie on a cooling rack.

text: Mix the butter together with the sugar in a medium sized bowl.  Mix the baking powder with the flour. Check to see if they are well combined. If they are not, mix for longer to ensure that they are evenly distributed. Sift the baking powder and flour into the bowl with the butter. Knead all of the ingredients to form a dough. Learn to knead dough here. Add the nuts, egg, and spices to the dough. Continue to knead. Place the dough in the refrigerator. Let it sit for at least half an hour (three hours at the most). Then, remove from the refrigerator. Separate the dough into four roughly even pieces.  Take 3/4 of the dough and roll it out. Watch how to roll pie dough here: how to roll and crimp pie dough. The dough should be about 2 centimeter (0.8 in) thick and should have a diameter of about 22 centimeters (8.7 in). Spread the jam evenly onto the dough.  Form a roll using the other quarter of the dough.  Make a lattice crust for the top crust. Learn how: making a lattice top pie crust. Brush the lattice crust with an egg wash. Learn to make an egg wash here. Decorate it with the hazelnuts.  Place the cake in the oven and bake it at 190 °C (374 °F) for about 45 Minutes  Cool the baked pie on a cooling rack.  Serve.
